data.text:
Novels of the World

This is an expanded list of novels (only) from each country which I hope will be useful for anyone else who wants to read their way through the world! Unlike The Big List, I’ve tried to concentrate on titles that have been available in English, where possible, as well as the ones I read when they aren’t available in English.

The ones I’ve read are in italics; the novels I’ve posted on in Tirelessreader for each country are underlined and have a link to the review page.

I’ve tried to keep names in the original order, so in countries like Japan and Hungary where the surname comes first I’ve put it in that order, even if the reverse order might be used in translations. In either case the surname is in CAPITALS.

(Surprise, surprise, this list is getting very big. This one is just for novels; I’ve split some of the content into some new lists:)

The Bigger List: Children’s and Fairy Tales

The Bigger List: Epic Poems and Prose Novels

The Bigger List: Graphic Novels and Comics

The Bigger List: Short Stories
